place.name: THORESWAY
place.gazetteerText: THORESWAY, a parish in Caistor district, Lincoln; 4 miles SSE of Caistor, and 4½ ENE of Usselby r. station. Post town, Caistor. Acres, 2,730. Real property, £3,474. Pop., 196. Houses, 32. The manor belongs to the Rev. J. Jarratt. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £700.* Patron, the Lord Chancellor. The church is ancient. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
